AddUserContact.document: This API is used to add the recipient name and email. The returned value is the ID of the successfully added recipient.
AddUserContact.name: Adds contact information

CreateDBDiagReportTask.document: This API is used to create a health report and send it via email as configured.
CreateDBDiagReportTask.name: Creates health report generation task

CreateDBDiagReportUrl.document: This API is used to create a URL for a health report.
CreateDBDiagReportUrl.name: Creates URL for health report

CreateMailProfile.document: This API is used to create the email configuration. The input parameter `ProfileType` represents the type of the email configuration. Valid values: `dbScan_mail_configuration` (email configuration of database inspection report) and `scheduler_mail_configuration` (email sending configuration of scheduled task health report). Please always select Guangzhou for `Region`, regardless of the region where the instance resides.
CreateMailProfile.name: Creates email configuration

CreateSchedulerMailProfile.document: This API is used to create the regular generation time of health reports and the regular email sending configuration. Please pass in the regular generation time of health reports as a parameter (Monday to Sunday) to set the regular generation time, and save the corresponding regular email sending configuration.
CreateSchedulerMailProfile.name: Creates scheduled task email sending configuration

CreateSecurityAuditLogExportTask.document: This API is used to create a security audit log export task.
CreateSecurityAuditLogExportTask.name: Creates security audit log export task

DeleteSecurityAuditLogExportTasks.document: This API is used to delete a security audit log export task.
DeleteSecurityAuditLogExportTasks.name: Deletes security audit log export task

DescribeAllUserContact.document: This API is used to get the information of the contact in the email.
DescribeAllUserContact.name: Gets the information of contact in email

DescribeAllUserGroup.document: This API is used to get the information of the contact group in the email.
DescribeAllUserGroup.name: Gets the information of contact group in email

DescribeDBDiagEvent.document: This API is used to get the details of an instance exception diagnosis event.
DescribeDBDiagEvent.name: Gets diagnosis event details

DescribeDBDiagHistory.document: This API is used to get the list of instance diagnosis events.
DescribeDBDiagHistory.name: Gets instance diagnosis history

DescribeDBDiagReportTasks.document: This API is used to query the list of health report generation tasks.
DescribeDBDiagReportTasks.name: Queries the list of health report generation tasks

DescribeDBSpaceStatus.document: This API is used to query the overview of instance space usage during a specified time period, including disk usage growth (MB), available disk space (MB), total disk space (MB), and estimated number of available days.
DescribeDBSpaceStatus.name: Gets the overview of instance space usage during specified time period

DescribeDiagDBInstances.document: This API is used to get the instance information list. Please always select Guangzhou for `Region`.
DescribeDiagDBInstances.name: Gets instance information list

DescribeHealthScore.document: This API is used to get the health score and deduction for exceptions in the specified time period (30 minutes) based on the instance ID.
DescribeHealthScore.name: Gets health score

DescribeMailProfile.document: This API is used to get the email sending configuration, including the email configuration for database inspection and the email sending configuration for scheduled task health reports.
DescribeMailProfile.name: Gets email configuration

DescribeMySqlProcessList.document: This API is used to query the real-time thread list of a relational database.
DescribeMySqlProcessList.name: Queries the list of real-time threads

DescribeSecurityAuditLogDownloadUrls.document: This API is used to query the download link of a security audit log export file. Currently, log file download only provides a Tencent Cloud private network address. Please download it by using a CVM instance in the Guangzhou region.
DescribeSecurityAuditLogDownloadUrls.name: Queries the download link of security audit log export file

DescribeSecurityAuditLogExportTasks.document: This API is used to query the list of security audit log export tasks.
DescribeSecurityAuditLogExportTasks.name: Queries the list of security audit log export tasks

DescribeSlowLogTimeSeriesStats.document: This API is used to get the slow log statistics histogram.
DescribeSlowLogTimeSeriesStats.name: Gets slow log statistics histogram

DescribeSlowLogTopSqls.document: This API is used to get and sort the top slow SQL statements in a specified time period by the aggregation mode of SQL template plus schema.
DescribeSlowLogTopSqls.name: Queries slow log statistics in specified time period by SQL template

DescribeSlowLogUserHostStats.document: This API is used to get the statistical distribution chart of slow log source addresses.
DescribeSlowLogUserHostStats.name: Gets the statistical distribution chart of slow log source addresses

DescribeTopSpaceSchemaTimeSeries.document: This API is used to get the daily space data of top databases consuming the most instance space. The data is daily collected by DBbrain during a specified time period. The returned results are sorted by size by default.
DescribeTopSpaceSchemaTimeSeries.name: Gets the daily space statistics of top databases during specified time period

DescribeTopSpaceSchemas.document: This API is used to get the real-time space statistics of top databases of an instance. The returned results are sorted by size by default.
DescribeTopSpaceSchemas.name: Gets the space statistics of top databases

DescribeTopSpaceTableTimeSeries.document: This API is used to get the daily space data of top tables consuming the most instance space. The data is daily collected by DBbrain during a specified time period. The returned results are sorted by size by default.
DescribeTopSpaceTableTimeSeries.name: Gets the daily space statistics of top tables during specified time period

DescribeTopSpaceTables.document: This API is used to get the real-time space statistics of top tables of an instance. The returned results are sorted by size by default.
DescribeTopSpaceTables.name: Gets the space statistics of top tables

DescribeUserSqlAdvice.document: This API is used to get SQL statement optimization suggestions.
DescribeUserSqlAdvice.name: Gets SQL statement optimization suggestions

KillMySqlThreads.document: This API is used to interrupt the current session according to the session ID. It needs to be called twice to commit the session interruption task in two stages. In the pre-commit stage, the stage value is `Prepare`, and the returned value is `SqlExecId’. In the commit stage, the stage value is `Commit`, and `SqlExecId` will be passed in as a parameter. Then the session process will be terminated.
KillMySqlThreads.name: Kills MySQL threads

ModifyDiagDBInstanceConf.document: This API is used to enable/disable instance inspection.
ModifyDiagDBInstanceConf.name: Enables/Disables instance inspection

members.document: Recipient name, which can contain up to 20 letters, digits, spaces, and special symbols `!@#$%^&*()_+-=()` and cannot begin with an underscore.

Valid values: DataLength, IndexLength, TotalLength, DataFree, FragRatio, TableRows, PhysicalFileSize (only supported for TencentDB for MySQL instances). For TencentDB for MySQL instances, the default value is `PhysicalFileSize`. For other database instances, the default value is `TotalLength`.
members.name: SortBy
